layer at (0,0) size 800x600
  LayoutView at (0,0) size 800x600
layer at (0,0) size 800x66
  LayoutBlockFlow {html} at (0,0) size 800x66
    LayoutBlockFlow {body} at (8,8) size 784x50
      LayoutTable {table} at (0,0) size 784x50 [border: (1px outset #808080)]
        LayoutBlockFlow {caption} at (0,0) size 784x20 [bgcolor=#00FF00]
          LayoutText {#text} at (252,0) size 280x19
            text run at (252,0) width 205: "This caption should have a lime "
            text run at (456,0) width 76: "background"
        LayoutTableSection (anonymous) at (1,21) size 782x28
          LayoutTableRow {tr} at (0,2) size 782x24
            LayoutTableCell {td} at (2,2) size 778x24 [border: (1px inset #808080)] [r=0 c=0 rs=1 cs=1]
              LayoutText {#text} at (2,2) size 22x19
                text run at (2,2) width 22: "cell"
